name: brucedeborah d
text: People friendly, food cooked according to specifications but pizza hut has changed their recipe. Pan now tastes like sauce and cheese cooked on bread. Bland and so disappointing

name: michele vasilow
text: Good pizza, great price if ordering online.  Would be 5 stars today.  Yesterday's pizza was delicious.  But not always consistent.

name: Allan Fuller
text: Terrible food. Some employees are rude

name: Dreah Modica
text: I ordered a large pizza and Wings , when it arrived it was a small and they denied that we ordered a large and didn’t even give us the receipt, the so called manager that cooked our food and made our order was very disrespectful!

name: Joseph Brophy
text: Stopped at Noonish for lunch. Decided to try the buffet. Salad was plentiful but entree's were disappointing and poorly replenished. I was told the wait staff had called in sick and kitchen staff was trying to make due through a lunch rush. Hopefully it was just a one time thing. Otherwise I would not recommend this place.

name: Bill Edwards
text: Extremely slow,  there was just one server for the whole place.  She did her best but Management needs some coaching,  they should never expect one server to handle the entire restaurant especially on a Friday evening

name: victoria harris
text: Dining in there always busy and never paying attention to the customers seems like there ALWAYS rehiring tween girls to work there and every single time iv ordered from them they messed up the order or have us burnt and destroyed messed up …More

name: Amy Preston
text: Every time I order delivery or pick up from the Pizza Hut in Norwich, the people that work there are always SUPER nice! We ordered delivery tonight, and even the delivery driver was sweet and helpful!

name: Savanah Clarkson
text: This place is great and they have really good food!

name: Sherry Stone
text: Wow, the Norwich Pizza Hut is having issues. Wilted salad, no manager, out of Chocolate milk and totally out of dessert pizza for the lunch buffet. Sad after such an amazing experience last week at the Rome Pizza Hut lunch buffet! Don't get me wrong the staff was nice but it was disappointing.

name: Heather Phillips
text: The food was a little disappointing. Ordered on the app, with extra cheese, barely go any. The pizza of the pizza was much small than what it has been in the past.  Just ok.

name: sharleen valdez
text: I loved it soo much i felt like i was in a fancy restaurant not at a pizza place. The pizza was delicious and very good prices, they even have a buffet it looked delicious ill try that next time

name: Solomon Maricle
text: Always has fresh pizza at the buffet, and wings too :)

name: Priscilla Todd
text: The food was horrible we used to go to Pizza hut years ago and it was wonderful but now the food is not tasty. The salad bar was low on food the pizza on the salad bar was not fresh we had to wait for them to make more. And they are grossly understaffed. However our waitress did the best she could.

name: Patrick K Matteson
text: Need to step up their game, wings been dry last 2 orders. Asked for hand tossed crust & got pan pizza on last order.

name: Daniel Benedict
text: Lori  Beth Mirabito was fantastic waitress spagetti was barely warm but other than that it was wonderful

name: Deborah Wilson
text: They were so nice. Usually I just order online but we'll definitely be going back for more.

name: Mat White
text: Friendly service, clean dining room an affordable pizza. Is it the best pizza on the planet?, No— but it is consistent and satisfying if you're not looking to break the bank. …More

name: brendan conners
text: All the tables where filled with the previous dinners plates. Service was poor. Buffett was was empty and the food that was there was old. Restrooms where poorly supplied. Buffett plates had to be picked through because they where dirty. No eat wear at the one clean table.

name: Allan Fuller
text: Its alright definitely last pizza place id go to tho

name: nicholas ferguson
text: It's okay, I go here often especially for the lunch buffet. Theres much better pizza around but they are cheap and they have alot of variety I just wish they kept the buffet stocked better. You're lucky to have 2 pizzas available at a time for the buffet but the staff are nice and always fast

text: Called 4 times to place a pick up order, put on hold all 4 times, asked for name and phone number then they hung up the phone... came to order in person explained that I called 4 times and was hung up on each time, the excuse was sorry we …More

name: Garrett Raymond
text: Food was good and service was good but the restaurant and bathrooms could use some repairs and touch ups.

name: Rose Laughlin
text: Pizzas were burnt that were on the salad bar and the salad was wilted. Also, there was no lemon for the water. It seems to get worse ever time I go. I won't be back after this time.

name: Theresa Harris
text: Food is great but the website, in which I use, doesn't tell you if they have a delivery driver. This makes it harder for me to know so I can order somewhere else.

name: Erin Schuman
text: Dine in experience has always been great but when ordering out I have NEVER received my exact order. I dont know if its because we order online or what but we have actually made a guessing game out of it now. My husband and I will guess what is wrong or missing. Lol. Its. Every. Single. time!!! Its just funny at this point.

name: Carol Lyons
text: Hard to give a good rating when no one showed up for their shift on New Year's Eve and delivery ended up being a pick-up. Manager was very understanding and gave us our meal for free.

text: Been here many times but this time but never had the kind no of service we got tonight . the person that waited on my family and I was great. From the second we walked in to we left he was kind and just made sure we had everything we …More

Clean all thru the dining room and also the bathroom. Pizza and bread sticks were very good. Salad bar was fully stocked, fresh and clean.
